name: Opera House
overview: Every opera singer dreams of stepping out of the chorus and standing center stage....a star!! For most, it remains just that, a dream. Yes you are about to do all that and more! Plucked from obscurity to perform at one of the most famous opera houses in the world....the Palace Theatre, home of the National Opera Company. However, on your arrival, tired and penniless you find the place deserted! Just as you are about to give up and leave you hear footsteps behind you, you turn and.... This game was released in a bundle with "QA!".
